Summary: after visiting carlsbad caverns, my family observed cigar shaped object with visible port holes
divs: Sighting DetailsAfter visiting carlsbad caverns new mexico, my family and I spotted a bright cigar shaped object with visible port holes staying with us about one fourth of a mile away and about 45 degrees in elevation. It stayed with us for about 10 minutes and then sped off in a very high rate of speed (almost in a flash). I was 8-9 years old but remember it very well. I think we were going north at about 60 mph maybe 25 miles in the desert from the caverns. This is the first of two encounters I have had.
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Carlsbad
There were no other sightings in Carlsbad on or around July 15th 1958
